2081760.name: The Pale
2081760.description:
The Pale is a tense and atmospheric survival horror, inspired by classic 90s PSX titles.

You play as Arthur, a deadbead dad who's just got the job of the new lighthouse keeper on the Pale, a remote island off the coast of Maine. As the new keeper, Arthur is responsible for upkeeping coastguard property... until he makes a horrific discovery. Now you must fight to keep Arthur alive and survive the horrors of the Island.

The dark history of the Pale is waking up. Can you survive long enough to unlock its secrets?

Game features:

  • Tank controls
  • 3rd person, cinematic camera angles
  • Body horror
  • Multiple endings (choices matter)
  • 4:3 aspect ratio
  • Melee and ranged combat
  • Manual saves
  • Puzzles
  • Karma system
  • Retro PSX era graphics
2081760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
